line.originaltext: 4 pounds boneless chuck roast
2 cups water
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix
line.annotation: create_ing(ing22, "1 (1 ounce) package dry onion and mushroom soup mix")

line.originaltext: 1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce
3 potatoes, peeled and chopped
2 stalks celery, chopped
2 carrots, chopped
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag.
Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag.
Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag.
Score roast on top and sides, and place in a medium sized oven bag.
Combine water, soup mix, and Worcestershire sauce; pour over roast.
line.annotation: combine({ing21, ing22, ing23}, ing28, "sauce", "in an implicit bowl and stirred with an implicit utensil")

line.originaltext: Combine water, soup mix, and Worcestershire sauce; pour over roast.
line.annotation: combine({ing27, ing28}, ing29, "sauced roast", "pour over meat in bag")

line.originaltext: Arrange vegetables around meat.
line.annotation: combine({ing24, ing25, ing26}, ing30, "vegetables", "Consolidate for greater efficiency")

line.originaltext: Arrange vegetables around meat.
Arrange vegetables around meat.
line.annotation: do(ing30, t7, ing31, "vegetable arranged around meat", "arrange neatly")

line.originaltext: Arrange vegetables around meat.
line.annotation: combine({ing29, ing31}, ing32, "roast, suace and vegetables", "container logic")

line.originaltext: Place oven bag on a roasting pan.
Place oven bag on a roasting pan.
line.annotation: do(ing32, t9, ing33, "roast ready to cook", "they're in the bag, so put the bag in the pan")

line.originaltext: Place roast in oven, and immediately reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Place roast in oven, and immediately reduce heat to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C).
Bake for 1 1/2 hours for medium well done, or adjust time for desired doneness.
Bake for 1 1/2 hours for medium well done, or adjust time for desired doneness.
